system.description: This spell functions like bull's strength, except that it affects multiple creatures. Each target gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength and the usual benefits to Strength-based skills and melee damage.

components.materialDescription: A few hairs or a pinch of dung from a bull (arcane); divine focus (divine).

system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
